contactUsDescription: Have questions or feedback? Fill out the form below and we'll get back to you.
yourMessagePlaceholder: Please type your detailed message here...
contactFormInfoDescription: This form will send an email to {adminEmail}. If the admin email is not configured in General Settings (Footer Contact Email), it may fall back to the system's 'EMAIL_FROM' address from .env.
contactFormSuccessMessage: Thank you for contacting us. We'll get back to you shortly.
takeawayOrderPlacedSuccess: Your takeaway order has been successfully placed.
bookingRequestSuccess: Your booking request has been successfully submitted.
